document_data.name: Venom Immunity
document_data.mainbody: '''''Venom immunity''''' was a [[necromancy]] [[spell]] used in the [[Underdark]].
document_data.Effects: This spell rendered either the caster or recipient immune to all toxins for the duration of the spell. Unlike an antidote or the higher-level [[neutralize poison|''neutralize poison'']] spell, venom immunity did not cure the target of their existing toxins.
document_data.Components: The spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[Somatic component|somatic]] components.
